posts.title: A blog about time thinking pickup lines
posts.content: I thought about writing this website as a fun way to learn programming with nextjs. I wasn't entirely sure this would work though

posts.title: how writing pickup lines is like poetry
posts.content: writing this stuff is fun because you have to creatively use the language for a purpose. It's like a tool for focusing

posts.title: How writing for nextjs is kind of diffuclt
posts.content: Finding a beginning tutorial for nextjs is hard because it's hard to find a simple example where you can get started
